title: Emerald Cascade Haaram - A Symphony of Tradition and Sparkle
materials: 15 stones). Features a refined Hyderabadi polish.
features: This exquisite necklace showcases a beautifully crafted cascade design. Pear-shaped Emeralds are gracefully suspended from a delicate lattice of gold and sparkling diamonds. The floral motifs are inspired by traditional South Indian aesthetics, seamlessly blended with a modern, minimalist setting. The gold work features intricate detailing, adding depth and texture to the piece.
colors: and the dazzling white of the Diamonds create a captivating color harmony.
occasions: and grand celebrations. Its contemporary design makes it suitable for modern events while retaining the traditional charm for occasions like Seemantham (baby shower)
description: This Emerald Cascade Haaram is a statement piece, offering a unique blend of traditional South Indian design and contemporary elegance. The high-quality Emeralds and Diamonds, combined with superior craftsmanship, ensure lasting beauty and value. It's a piece that embodies sophistication and cultural richness, making it a treasured heirloom.
